Articles.Content: In my opinion, I prefer the look of the old KSP 2 skybox seen in various prelaunch videos and screenshots over the one currently in the game and I wonder if it could ever be brought back. The old skybox looks more crisp and clean to me along with the greenish-blue tint that gives off a kind of "alien" feel. I can see why people might prefer a less visually noticeable and more realistic skybox, though I think it would be neat to see this return in a mod or optional setting.

At least skybox needs to be different when traveling to other star systems.

For me biggest problems with skyboxes is that some starts looks very big and bright circles, because i play with high res big television.
